alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockingham, southwestern Pittsylvania and south central Henry Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eden to near Kernersville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Eden... Reidsville... Wentworth... Madison... Stoneville... Mayfield... and Intelligence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
